dmca.title: Notice of copyright infringement (http://www.warezover.com)
dmca.body:
EN

-----Original Message-----
From: piracy@templatemonster.com [mailto:piracy@templatemonster.com] 
Sent: Monday, November 01, 2004 12:23 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Notice of copyright infringement (http://www.warezover.com)

Dear Lance Crosby,

We are trying to contact you cause you are the person who is a
designated agent that is responsible for copyright infringement
claims.

We at Artvertex, Inc. have come to be aware that you or your customers are
hosting a website that is a copyright infringement of our website Template
Monster content at the address http://www.templatemonster.com The website in
question is http://www.warezover.com. We have the evidence that this site
illegally distributes our products without being assigned ANY copyright
license. http://www.warezover.com/forum/forumdisplay.php?f=9
Our website clearly states "Website pages content copyright - 2002-2003
Artvertex, Inc." The presence of this material on your server is illegal.
Website content cannot be reproduced, copied, or edited in any manner or
medium and is therefore making you posses illegal material. US copyright
laws protect all parts of this material. The owner of this website has been
notified of his actions, and has been told the consequences. If the site is
not removed from your servers within the next 10 days our Copyright attorney
will file a civil lawsuit in federal court against both you and the owner of
the site. I strongly urge you to delete the hosting account for
http://www.warezover.com within those 10 days, before this action is taken.
This site is attempting to profit from our material and therefore the U.S.
attorneys can get involved. If ALL of this material is removed within 10
days then no action will be taken against you or the site owner, and neither
will be convicted of a federal crime. This the 3rd hosting account for this
website, all previous were closed due to our notifications. Please remove
the account as soon as you receive this if possible.
- --
Best regards,
Ryan Cathcart
Legal assistant
Artvertex, Inc.
22 Jordan Road
NY, Troy, 12180
Tel:  19174770238 ext 106
mailto:piracy@templatemonster.com
